column1: I hope you will join me in applauding all the work that @realdonaldtrump and @stevedaines have done for Montana agriculture as their hard work has delivered huge wins for Montana ranchers and farmers. @MTstockgrowers #mtpol #mtsen #MAGA  https://t.co/RKKhVaE4mt

The United States-Mexico-Canada trade deal is huge news for Montana's farmers and ranchers. Honored to play a role in getting this out of the Senate. #mtpol #mtsen #MAGA #USMCA  https://t.co/U9jDuzMsbZ

I’m also incredibly thankful for Senator Daines for his leadership for fighting for our farmers and ranchers every step of the way and for his own negotiations in securing these monumental deals. @MTStockgrowers #mtpol #mtsen #MAGA https://t.co/RKKhVaVFe1
Honored to work w/ @realdonaldtrump to get this one done for Montana Ag! #mtpol #mtsen #MAGA #AmericaFirst #ChinaTradeDeal  https://t.co/ANBdPD0WpM

“Senator Daines has been at the forefront of trying to get the Chinese beef market open and this deal definitely gets that accomplished but also pork and poultry which we provide a lot of out of north-central Montana.” #mtpol #mtsen #MAGA  https://t.co/FVORfWlIlL
HUGE news for MT farmers and ranchers. America FIRST trade deal! #ChinaTradeDeal #mtpol #mtsen #MAGA  https://t.co/0jXgCmWKlz
“This means billions of dollars for our ag industry which is a very big deal for Montana” #ChinaTradeDeal #mtpol #mtsen #MAGA  https://t.co/ANBdPCJl1c
Thank you for the shout out Mr. President! And as always GO CATS! Hope to bring you to Bobcat Stadium soon! #MAGA #mtpol #mtsen  https://t.co/6a6OtqQeVv

This was all achieved by putting Montana first — and that’s why I was humbled to be named the most bipartisan and effective member of my U.S. Senate class. #mtsen #mtpol #MAGA  https://t.co/Rpfnwxh9iH
If Congress can't pass a balanced budget they shouldn't get paid. Plain and simple. #mtsen #mtpol #MAGA.  https://t.co/RpfnwxyKHh
Our #2A Rights will ALWAYS be protected! #mtsen #mtpol #MAGA  https://t.co/nm8GB44OFz
Soleimani was an evil terrorist with the blood of over 600 Americans on his hands. President Trump was right to take him out to save American lives. #mtpol #mtsen #MAGA  https://t.co/r79VXkP8eY
This is GREAT news for Montana's farmers and ranchers - major opportunity to compete on the global stage! #mtpol #mtsen #MAGA  https://t.co/Vm449kw8ek

“It’s time to put up or shut up and stand up to Nancy Pelosi” – Sen. Daines #mtpol #mtsen #MAGA  https://t.co/lsY30iWotc
Enough is enough. The Senate will put an end to the Democrats’ impeachment obsession. It’s time to get back to work for the American people!  https://t.co/CJJg5pCTRd
